Articles.Content:
> 
> Keep up the great work Pk. I love the new textures in 0.2.
> I landed on Vassa yesterday, forgot to take pictures though.

If you were me, There would be 10 photos only of the re-entry on the screenshots folder! XD

Also, Augustus, he just asked if I wanted some help, don't get crazy! (Although actually I don't need help)

How big are the textures for this mod?

EDIT: I always crash with this mod installed.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-06T19:52:21Z" title="08/06/2015 07:52  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 6, 2015</time> by TheJewelOfJool**
Use TextureReplacer, it unloads textures from the RAM after KSP is finished loading.
I have TextureReplacer and ActiveTextureManagement.

> 
> How big are the textures for this mod?
> EDIT: I always crash with this mod installed.

The most are 2048x1024 png images, some are 1024x512 though.

How many RAM do you use with your KSP? Do you have OpenGL mode on?
I have OpenGL mode pk.
What mods you have installed? Do you have Module manager up to date?
Are any of these planets habitable?

Hello,

In my free time the past couple days, I wrote up a small ScienceDef config that you can use. It so far only has some CrewReports,EVAS, SurfaceSamples and gravity scans for now (planning on adding more later).

You can use what I have already if you want.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/jaw9xui7vnyr5mn/ScienceDefs.cfg?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/jaw9xui7vnyr5mn/ScienceDefs.cfg?dl=0)

> 
> Hello,
> In my free time the past couple days, I wrote up a small ScienceDef config that you can use. It so far only has some CrewReports,EVAS, SurfaceSamples and gravity scans for now (planning on adding more later).
> 
> You can use what I have already if you want.
> 
> [https://www.dropbox.com/s/jaw9xui7vnyr5mn/ScienceDefs.cfg?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/jaw9xui7vnyr5mn/ScienceDefs.cfg?dl=0)

Pretty good science defs! Most of them are very good but very repetitive, altough I can make some changes. Thanks! (You'll be added in the mod crew list if they're added)
Your mod seems to always crash my saves when I load them. Might be my heavy modded install, but if anyone else has this problem let me know.

My dream came true!! A up to date mod with a star you can go to!!![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T19:17:43Z" title="08/11/2015 07:17  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by Blueshark109**
  
A Happy Face.

> 
> My dream came true!! A up to date mod with a star you can go to!!![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

KerbalGalaxy 2 adds stars too. The only difference with this mod is that is isn't a WIP

> 
> Your mod seems to always crash my saves when I load them. Might be my heavy modded install, but if anyone else has this problem let me know.

Can I have your output\_log after it crashes to try to solve it?
I've stopped playing with the mod.

Making Prima and Secunda a barycentric system can be done with SigmaBinary.

Also I want the craft file for your probe!

:hailprobe

Working on the Prima-Secunda binary thing:

![a900cd2cdde8fc73de15eceb4710ebb9.png](https://i.gyazo.com/a900cd2cdde8fc73de15eceb4710ebb9.png)

A GIF at max stock time-warp: [http://i.imgur.com/1oNS5zw.gif](http://i.imgur.com/1oNS5zw.gif)

> 
> Making Prima and Secunda a barycentric system can be done with SigmaBinary.
> Also I want the craft file for your probe!
> 
> :hailprobe

SigmaBinary can't do what You saw in this comment! Look at that madness!

The craft file: [http://kerbalx.com/pkmniako/Koyager](http://kerbalx.com/pkmniako/Koyager)
If I started a save with this other worlds mod, and didn't leave the kerbin system until the mod was better fleshed out, would updates to this mod break my save?

No, but it's...

> ![064ceeb1ab9e3baa1dd64dcc7e3efd08.png](https://i.gyazo.com/064ceeb1ab9e3baa1dd64dcc7e3efd08.png)
Are you still planning on adding a kerbin like planet to the Cercani system?

This is some truly lovely work!

First - have rep. Second - let me add this to my twitch playthroughs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
So far I've tested this with my 85+ flight file, and it doesn't appear to have affected any orbits.

> 
> Are you still planning on adding a kerbin like planet to the Cercani system?

Do you see that ![System%20n3-0%25-lightgrey.svg](https://img.shields.io/badge/System%20n3-0%25-lightgrey.svg) on the signature? One of it's planets will be a terra.

> 
> This is some truly lovely work!
> First - have rep. Second - let me add this to my twitch playthroughs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks!

Just remember to backup saves! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT:

> 
> So far I've tested this with my 85+ flight file, and it doesn't appear to have affected any orbits.
